name: Eseapner
description:
Psychological thriller, where SHE holds power over you. A lot of victims died here. She made them her slaves to become stronger and more bloodthirsty. Can you resist it in the struggle for survival?
Eseapner is an survival-horror game made on blender engine.
We tried to transform classic horror gameplay into first-person game with highly detailed interiors, textures and lighting.
This game is result of many years of developing.
If you like surreal, depressive and dark games, then you'll love Eseapner.
